ComicInfo.Title: The Man in the Cellar; He Walks Among Us; They Meet by Night!; Someone Is Following; The Hole in the Ground; None Are So Blind
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Man in the Cellar: A man uses a time machine to solve money problems.
He Walks Among Us: An actor realizes that he is actually a robot animated by the thought patterns of a human.
They Meet by Night!: Some aliens give confederate money to an embezzler in order to purchase samples of technology.
Someone Is Following: A member of the chronology protection force warns a man not to give an inventor two hundred dollars.
The Hole in the Ground: 'Alice in Wonderland' is in reality a story based on an encounter between the author and elves.
None Are So Blind: The owner of a carnival ride likes kids so much he doesn't charge them to ride 'the flying carpet' and so is poor. He discovers alien families who have lost their home planet and puts them to work as the successful new 'flying saucer' ride.
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
ComicInfo.Penciller: Bob Forgione,Al Hartley,Tony Mortellaro,Robert Q. Sale,Bill Draut,Steve Ditko,Bob Forgione,Al Hartley,Tony Mortellaro,Robert Q. Sale,Bill Draut,Steve Ditko
ComicInfo.Inker: Jack Abel,George Roussos,Tony Mortellaro,Robert Q. Sale,Bill Draut,Steve Ditko,Jack Abel,George Roussos,Tony Mortellaro,Robert Q. Sale,Bill Draut,Steve Ditko
